segments.text: That water is just pouring out of the sink, making a huge mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that woman is just standing there, like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how dirty that water looks, spreading all over the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, taking those cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet those cookies are going to be all germy now, with the way they're handling them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to eat anything in this kitchen, that's for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up that mess soon, before it starts to smell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of all those germs spreading around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm going to have to wash my hands just from watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR
